title: Low Fat Chicken and Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['250ml chicken stock', '75g grated cabbage', '135g chopped carrot', '4 potatoes, cubed', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 (400g) tin cut green beans', '4 tablespoons chopped green pepper', '25ml tomato juice', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning', '140g cooked and cubed chicken', 'salt and pepper to taste']
